definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: The method based on region connectivity analysis and matched template for locating of news video caption.
sentences.chinese: 新聞視頻字幕定位的連通域法及模板匹配法。

sentences.english: Think of the endless opportunity our connectedness provides.
sentences.chinese: 想想我們當今社會的連通性給我們所帶來的無限機遇。

sentences.english: An algorithm fOr producing minimum spanning trees of undirected networks is provided.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一個獲取連通網絡是小生成樹的算法。

sentences.english: A domain consists of a registry and zero or more connectivity providers.
sentences.chinese: 域由一個註冊表和零個或更多連通性提供方組成。

sentences.english: Finally, some sufficient conditions that a hereditarily d'sconnected space is a totally disconnected space are given.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了遺傳不連通是完全不連通的一些充分條件。

sentences.english: Finally, some sufficient conditions that a hereditarily d'sconnected space is a totally disconnected space are given.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了遺傳不連通是完全不連通的一些充分條件。

sentences.english: Let M be a connected and compact homogeneous space.
sentences.chinese: 設M爲一連通的緊緻齊性空間。

sentences.english: The singular points are accurately detected at the centroid of the connected component.
sentences.chinese: 採用連通區域求質心的方法精確定位奇異點。

sentences.english: Rick chinned the helmet stud again and told Bela to make it quick.
sentences.chinese: 瑞克連通頭盔話筒，告訴貝拉動作要快。
支持完全集勢和連通性。

sentences.english: The paleokarst is not developed in vertical zoning and corroded cavity is isolated with poor connectivity.
sentences.chinese: 岩溶發育垂向分帶不明顯，溶蝕孔洞孤立且連通性差。

sentences.english: The crux of the algorithm comes in determining whether a node is the root of a strongly connected component.
sentences.chinese: 算法的關鍵是判斷一個結點是否是強連通分量的根。

sentences.english: The two sides are now linked by 558 direct flights per week.
sentences.chinese: 雙方現在通過每週558次直飛航班保持連通。

sentences.english: Willowy, has the handle peduncle to connect to the abdominal cavity, the boundary is unclear.
sentences.chinese: 有彈性，有柄蒂連通到腹腔內，邊界不清。

sentences.english: It is the porosity due to interconnected pores that can be filled with and emptied of water.
sentences.chinese: 這種孔隙率是水可流出和流入的連通空隙。

sentences.english: The proposed protocol can maintain 1-coverage and 1-connectivity of WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 該協議能夠保證網絡的1度覆蓋和1度連通。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
through transport/through traffic jointly organized by different enterprises
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
